lines.text: Uh... maybe that candle he's holding is somehow...
...How about, he's squeezing it like a stress ball, and that's hiding his pulse?
A-HA! Leo, Whydah denied it! That means it's the truth!
She's trying to get us to guess wrong, so she's denying the right answer!
I'm j-just saying you're wrong, because you're wrong.
Sheesh, all it takes is basic common sense to make you take her side?
